name: zola-build
description: Zola static site generator build and configuration management
author: AI Agent System

required_checks: Output directory created with expected files

key_concepts.taxonomies: Tags and categories for content organization
key_concepts.front_matter: YAML/TOML metadata at top of content files

common_issues.cause: Syntax error in template or missing template file
common_issues.solution: Check template syntax, verify all referenced templates exist

common_issues.cause: Incorrect front matter or file location
common_issues.solution: Verify front matter format, check file is in correct directory
Check taxonomy configuration, ensure content has correct metadata

common_issues.cause: Files not in static/ directory or incorrect paths
common_issues.solution: Place files in static/ directory, use correct relative paths

optimization_tips: Enable minify_html in config.toml for smaller HTML files
Use template inheritance to reduce duplication
Organize content with clear section structure
Use shortcodes for complex reusable components
validation_checks: Run 'zola check' to validate site structure
Test all templates render without errors
Verify all links work in built site
Check that all assets are properly copied

examples.action: Create new directory in content/, add _index.md, add poem files
Edit config.toml, rebuild site, test changes
Check error message, fix template syntax, rebuild

notes: Zola is a fast static site generator written in Rust
Templates use Jinja2 syntax with Zola extensions
Content is written in Markdown with front matter
Build output goes to public/ directory (in .gitignore)
